comments:
R3.2M5 on WinXP Pro SP2
AIX Server: Concurrent Versions System (CVS) 1.11.17 (client/server)

We are having a problem with checking out a particular project so the error from the server is expected.   i.e. we get the same error running cvs from the command line.

I opened this bug because Eclipse doesn't handle the error.

During the checkout of the project that causes the error (progress dialog is displayed)
1) the progress dialog is dismissed before the checkout has completed 
2) the outline of a window frame flashes, I assume it is about to display an error dialog but it goes away before there is any content in the error dialog
3) The conveyor icon (task icon?) has an error decorator (I have attached a screen cap) and the hover text says to press button for details
4) pressing the button does nothing (I believe it should open the cvs console with the error
5) There is a CVSException in the Error Log

Here is the stacktrace and after that a portion of the cvs console showing the error
